great job with everything. would you be able to let us know what software you use and exactly how you use it so we dont have to continuously ask you for requests? i know it must get annoying. thanks!

Everyone-

I use HandBrake (a free, open-source encoding app) to convert MKVs to .m4vs. You can find the presets I use for 720p & 1080p (and basic instructions, including which version of HB to download) at:
http://www.peejeshare.com/files/363230336/HandBrake_Presets_July2012.zip.html

I hope to do a step-by-step when I have time... no ETA tho. 

And I want to get around to some of the titles mentioned.

@dilligaf247 - Subler (the app I use to add subs, chapters, and tagging info) creates the Preview Images (the Photo-JPEG video track) whenever you add a chapter track.
@AeonTurquoise - tho I'll be silent for a while, the twitter handle is @techrod108
